TestCase.name: myTest
TestCase.Resource: SELECT s1, s2, b1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a) AS s1, b AS b1 FROM T1 group by b) RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SUM(a) AS s2, b AS b2 FROM T2 group by b) ON b1 = b2

LogicalProject(s1=[$0], s2=[$2], b1=[$1]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $3)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(s1=[$1], b1=[$0]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], s1=[SUM($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(b1=[$1], a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(s2=[$1], b2=[$0]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], s2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b2=[$1], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[s1, s2, b1]) +- MultipleInputNode :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b2]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b2], select=[b2, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) : +- Calc(select=[b AS b2, a]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b1]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b1], select=[b1, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[b AS b1, a]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
